channel.title: Help with 508
channel.description:
Where do i go to edit/remove a server message
It says this in the chatbox
Welcome to *Servername* NEW UPDATES BLAH BLAH BLAH [size=20pt]{SERVER} CREDITS TO BLAH BLAH[/size]
How do i edit/remove the [size=20pt]CREDITS TO BLAH BLAH??[/size]

item.title: Help with 508
item.dc:creator: @Windfury7 Windfury7
item.description:
@Windfury7 wrote:

Wow. Thanks you very very much…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with 508
item.dc:creator: @Server_Creator_Brian Server Creator Brian
item.description:
@Server_Creator_Brian wrote:

If you do not know how to delete this, i will walk you through in 8 easy steps…

  1. Go to Davidscape -> Players
  2. Click on Player.java.
  3. Hit Ctrl + F
  4. Search this: File curFile = new File("./data/mapdata/12351.txt");

It should turn up something like this…

public String readMaps() {
File curFile = new File("./data/mapdata/12351.txt");
if (curFile != null) {
String maps2 = getContents(curFile);
if (maps2 != null && maps2 != "") {
frames.sendMessage(this, "" + maps2);
return maps2;
}
return "";
}
return "";
}
  1. Replace that with this:
public String readMaps() {
return "";
}
  1. Now to delete the 12351 mapdata file… Go to: bin -> data -> mapdata
  2. Search for 12351
  3. Delete it.

And wahla, the annoying thing is gone :). [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 15, 2009, 05:24:38 pm[/size][hr][quote=“ShadowDD, post:10, topic:314278”]Wow how did you find that out did you look threw all mapdata mutters no life… Na im jking :P[/quote]

No, actually i run on Vista, and when i open a folder i can search through everything that that folder contains, and every document that folder contains, so all i did was search: [Server] Credits and it came up with what i needed and i knew how to delete it. Lol.

Read full topic
